title: Learn about the visitor resources available from AdventHealth Celebration, formerly Florida Hospital Celebration Health
description: The hospital amenities and visitor resources at AdventHealth Celebration, formerly Florida Hospital Celebration Health, include free hospital parking, compassionate pastoral care, touch-screen kiosks with hospital information and much more.
cleaned_text: Be Our Guest To create a positive experience, our facility is designed with patients, healing and visitors in mind. At AdventHealth Celebration, formerly Florida Hospital Celebration Health, we provide amenities like specialized concierge services, touch-screen kiosks and onsite PharmaCare Centers, and many more, described below. You matter. If there's anything we can do to improve the experience of you or your loved one, please do not hesitate to ask. Hospital Amenities - Concierge Services - Personal Pagers - PharmaCare Center Pharmacy - Chapel and Pastoral Care - Dining Options - AdventHealth Wellness Center Celebration (including Day Spa) - Market Place Gift Shop Patient Belongings and Valuables When visiting us, we recommend only bringing a few essential items with you. We are not responsible for any lost items, per our consent form. We suggest that any items that are brought with you to the hospital are sent home with your family or visitors. If a valuable item that is not an assistive device cannot be sent home, please connect with your health care team to discuss the option of securing your belongings with our security team. Please let your health care team know about any items you have with you during your stay. - Clothing - Denture Care - Hearing Aids - Eyeglasses and Contact Lenses - Wheelchairs, Walkers and Canes - Medications
